column4: can someone tell me what packages are involved in automounting removable media in 9.10 - I uninstalled f-spot and my removable media stopped working
do you mean that usb doesn't automount anymore?

sebsebseb: yes - usb mass storage and SD cards have both stopped automounting into gnome on all user accounts, i know f-spot isnt related, but it stopped working around the time i removed it, and when i removed it, a lot of dependant packages were also removed
